description: The Men’s Merino Sport Ultralite Anorak is filled with practical details: a half zipper for venting, double-welt hand pockets, a moveable fit, and adjustable cording at the waist and neck. Plus, they’ve added body-mapped panels of Merino Sport 120 fabric for breathability and temperature control. Capping it all off is the lightweight nylon outer shell, which helps with wind and weather resistance. Next time you’re about to head out when the weather’s questionable, be sure to bring this anorak along.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport Ultralite Anorak - Mens
